what: University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign Data Package

text: goal uiucdata provide data sets available University Illinois Urbana-Champaign (UIUC) diverse group individuals low barrier entry.

title: University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign Data Package
text: can install uiucdata github :

title: University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign Data Package
text: two ways access data contained within package. first load package type name data set. approach takes advantage R’s lazy loading mechansim, avoids loading data used R session. details lazy loading works, please see Section 1.17: Lazy Loading R Internals manual. second approach use data() command load data fly without type name data set.
code: # Load the `uiucdata` package library("uiucdata")  # See the first 10 observations of the `fall_enrolled_ranking` dataset head(fall_enrolled_ranking)  # View the help documentation for `fall_enrolled_ranking` ?fall_enrolled_ranking # Loading `fall_enrolled_ranking` without a `library(ucidata)` call data("fall_enrolled_ranking", package = "uiucdata")  # See the first 10 observations of the `fall_enrolled_ranking` dataset head(fall_enrolled_ranking)  # View the help documentation for `fall_enrolled_ranking` ?fall_enrolled_ranking

title: University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign Data Package
text: repository uses submodules way store data. allows us repositories contents final data product. result, avoid increase size repository since raw data now tracked separate repository. details, please see GitHub’s Working Submodules post.

title: University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign Data Package
text: NB repository made employee University Illinois Urbana-Champaign author data package. Raw grade data
code: # Add Excellent Teacher Data in data-raw git submodule add https://github.com/wadefagen/Teachers-Ranked-As-Excellent-UIUC data-raw/excellent-teachers git submodule add https://github.com/coatless/uiucgradedata data-raw/grade-dist

what: Enrollment based on Curriculum and Class Level Data from Fall 2004 - Spring 2017 — curriculum_and_class_level
title: Enrollment based on Curriculum and Class Level Data from Fall 2004 - Spring 2017 — curriculum_and_class_level
text: report uses final enrollment statistics official tenth day -campus terms. reports sorted college, department code, major code.

title: Enrollment based on Curriculum and Class Level Data from Fall 2004 - Spring 2017 — curriculum_and_class_level
Enrollment based on Curriculum and Class Level Data from Fall 2004 - Spring 2017 — curriculum_and_class_level
text: three different data sets documented simultaneously within file. fall_curriculum_class: 8590 observations 23 variables. spring_curriculum_class: 8760 observations 23 variables. summer_curriculum_class: 6369 observations 23 variables. format : term_code Factor ID Current Semester college Factor See Office Registrar department Factor Department Code degree Factor See http://catalog.illinois.edu/degree-programs/ major_code Factor Major number major_name Factor Name Major concentration_code Factor ID Major Concentration concentration_name Factor Name Major Concentration freshman Integer Count Enrolled Freshman sophomore Integer Count Enrolled Sophomores junior Integer Count Enrolled Juniors senior Integer Count Enrolled Seniors nondegree_undergrad Integer Count Non-degree Program Undergraduates total_undergrad Integer Count Enrolled Undergraduates grad_master Integer Count Enrolled Master Graduate Students grad_doctoral Integer Count Enrolled Doctoral Graduate Students nondegree_grad Integer Count Enrolled Non-degree Program Graduate Students total_grad Integer Count Enrolled Graduate Students professional Integer Count Professional Students overall_total Integer Count Enrolled Students academic_program_code Factor University ID Code Program Study e.g. 10KL0010BS, BS represents degre year Factor 2005 - 2016 term Factor Fall, Spring, Summer object class data.frame 8760 rows 23 columns. object class data.frame 6369 rows 23 columns.

title: Enrollment based on Curriculum and Class Level Data from Fall 2004 - Spring 2017 — curriculum_and_class_level
text: students taking least one -campus, credit-bearing class included reports. following categories students excluded: auditors (students taking non-credit classes); students taking extramural -campus classes; Medical Scholars taking -campus, non-MSP classes. Note: Illini Center MBA students included statistics.

what: Teachers Ranked as Excellent from Fall 1993 through Summer 2017 — excellent_teachers
title: Teachers Ranked as Excellent from Fall 1993 through Summer 2017 — excellent_teachers
text: collection "Teachers Ranked Excellent" UIUC Fall 1993 Summer 2017.

title: Teachers Ranked as Excellent from Fall 1993 through Summer 2017 — excellent_teachers
Teachers Ranked as Excellent from Fall 1993 through Summer 2017 — excellent_teachers
text: data.frame 85,778 observations 9 variables: term: Two letter semester code (sp, su, fa, wi) followed four digit year. Examples: sp2017, fa2013, su2012. semester: Two letter semester code Examples: sp, su, fa, wi year: Four digit year. Examples: 2017, 2013, 2012. unit: CITL-supplied headers unit teaching course. Examples: ACCOUNTANCY, SOCIAL WORK, LINGUISTICS, NUCLEAR, PLASMA & RAD. ENGR. lname: last name teacher. Examples: FAGEN-ULMSCHNEIDER, FLANAGAN, FLECK fname: first letter first name teacher. Examples: W, K, M role: Instructor TA ranking: Excellent Outstanding course: course teacher ranked excellent.  course given, course field set NA (includes cases raw data lists course 0, 000, 999). Examples: 199, 225, 560, NA

title: Teachers Ranked as Excellent from Fall 1993 through Summer 2017 — excellent_teachers
text: Wade Fagen-Ulmschneider Teaching Assistant Professor, Computer Science University Illinois Urbana-Champaign http://waf.cs.illinois.edu/

title: Teachers Ranked as Excellent from Fall 1993 through Summer 2017 — excellent_teachers
text: University Illinois Urbana-Champaign, every semester students complete Instructor Course Evaluation (ICES) questionnaire course enrolled.  Center Innovation Teaching Learning (CITL) compiles data list "Teachers Ranked Excellent" publishes names teaches local newspaper online PDF

title: Teachers Ranked as Excellent from Fall 1993 through Summer 2017 — excellent_teachers
text: https://github.com/wadefagen/Teachers-Ranked--Excellent-UIUC

what: Grade Distribution Data from Summer 2005 - Summer 2017 — grade_dist

text: Grade distributions letter grade every class instructor Summer 2005 Summer 2017 University Illinois Urbana-Champaign (UIUC).

title: Grade Distribution Data from Summer 2005 - Summer 2017 — grade_dist
Grade Distribution Data from Summer 2005 - Summer 2017 — grade_dist
text: data.frame 124155 25 variables format : crn Course Registration Number subject Department course offered course Course Number course_title Name Course course_section Lecture, Discussion, Online Section ID sched_type Lecture, Discussion, Online a_plus Number Students Receiving + Weighted 4.00 Number Students Receiving Weighted 4.00 a_minus Number Students Receiving - Weighted 3.67 b_plus Number Students Receiving B+ Weighted 3.33 b Number Students Receiving B Weighted 3.00 b_minus Number Students Receiving B- Weighted 2.67 c_plus Number Students Receiving C+ Weighted 2.33 c Number Students Receiving C Weighted 2.00 c_minus Number Students Receiving C- Weighted 1.67 D_plus Number Students Receiving D+ Weighted 1.33 d Number Students Receiving D Weighted 1.00 d_minus Number Students Receiving D- Weighted 0.67 f Number Students Receiving F Weighted 0.00 w Number Students Receiving W (Withdrawal) average_grade average GPA course semester Name term: Fall, Winter, Spring, Summer year Year semester takes place .

title: Grade Distribution Data from Summer 2005 - Summer 2017 — grade_dist
